events.message: I received my order today, but the product was not what I expected and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's message indicates a request for a refund due to dissatisfaction with the received product.
Assigning case to refund specialist team to handle the refund process efficiently.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund request and will guide you through the next steps.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you would like to return the product for a refund?
My order number is 123456789. The item doesn't match the description and I no longer need it, so I want to return it.
Thank you for the details. You are eligible for a full refund. Please follow the return shipping label we will email you shortly.
Thanks for your quick response. I appreciate the clear instructions and look forward to receiving the return label.
The return label was sent and refund will be processed upon receipt of the item returned to our warehouse.
Just following up to confirm if you were able to send back the item and if you need further assistance.
Yes, I shipped the product yesterday using the provided label. Thank you for your support.
We have received your returned item and processed your refund. You should see the amount credited within 3-5 business days.
Your refund case has been closed. Please contact us if you have any further questions or concerns. Thank you!
